reviews.review: Every new dlc and mid chapter patch the devs somehow manage to go backwards instead of forwards when it comes to balancing. This game has some awful balance changes which doesn't change up the meta for perks as each new perk just only goes well with one build or certain killers. The only reason this game is still being played is the fact that there isn't a game similar to this style of game and if there was it won't last for a while. Friday the 13th had a chance but the lawsuits just killed it off. Last Year had a chance but game flopped due to being only on Discord's game store which flopped, will there ever be a game to push this out of the spot of 4v1 horror game. Time will only tell...
One of my favorite games of all time if not my most favorite. Love every aspect of this game & I love the Dead By Daylight community and how each round is  fun. (to me)

BHVR has done a great job with this one, putting you all in the same queue with memers, comp players, and casuals alike. the foremost in horror hide-and-seek games, and undoubtedly best in that class right now.

This game offers both things easy to pick-up, as well as killers with an almost infinite skill cieling. give this one a try, and i'll see you in the fog.

I am an  avid fan of survival horror and coop games. Dead by Daylight checks most of the boxes of an enjoyable survival horror with coop. As with all games, there are some bugs that can be a little frustrating (referring to ridiculously large  hit boxes for the killers as well as some faulty pallet drops), but as a whole this is an enjoyable game with friends (or solo if that's your vibe).
